main_definition: Menus refer to a list of food items or beverages available at an eatery, or it can also denote the printed list of dishes with their prices used by waiters in restaurants.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A list of food and drink options offered by a restaurant
meanings_and_examples.example: The Italian restaurant had a wide variety of menus, from pizzas to pasta dishes.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Printed lists in restaurants that help waiters take orders
meanings_and_examples.example: At the table, we picked up the menu and placed it down as our waiter came over with his order pad.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A set of courses served during a meal at a restaurant or hotel
meanings_and_examples.example: The five-course dinner menus included soup, salad, fish, main course and dessert.
